snippet.title: Asgard’s Wrath 2 | Official Gameplay Reveal Trailer | Meta Quest 2 + 3 + Pro
snippet.description:
Loki must be stopped. His chaos has corrupted the realm of ancient Egypt, and is threatening to tear apart the very fabric of reality itself. Battle gods and monsters at an epic scale to keep his evil from spreading, and exact your vengeance for his betrayal.

Roam massive living worlds, engage in visceral combat, and embark on a legendary quest to save all of reality in the highly anticipated VR Action RPG from Sanzaru Games & Oculus Studios. Asgard’s Wrath 2, coming Winter 2023 - only on Meta Quest.

Pre-order now and unlock in-game exclusives and more: https://metaque.st/AsgardsWrath2
